evidence_in_dialogue: [[Brass]] officer clay entered the store unaware of a robbery that was in progress
[[Robbins]] officer clay was killed by a single close-range shotgun blast to the back of the head
[[Brass]] we matched your prints from a stolen car off the prints from a prior car theft , and bingo , we had a match
[[Warrick]] even , still , he 's looking at four counts of felony murder
[[Nick]] ran the criminal records for the employees
